backend/main.mo: Defines product, blog, order, and user profile types with authorization and storage mixins, and exposes queries/mutations for profiles and product filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides for the site's design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, favicon, root mount point, and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup defining all public and admin routes with shared layout including header and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Slide‑in cart panel showing items, quantity controls, subtotal, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, pricing, badges, and wishlist toggle functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the main site header with navigation, user actions, cart access, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, blog posts, user profiles, wishlist, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, typography, animations, and utility classes for layout and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays user account info and order history, fetching profile and orders via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBlogPage.t: Placeholder page for future blog management interface.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying product, blog, order, and message statistics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDesignsPag: Placeholder page for future designs management interface.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Defines admin panel layout with access control, navigation sidebar, and routed content area.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Placeholder page for future user message management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page for future order management interface.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Static admin page placeholder showing a heading and coming-soon message for product management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Static admin settings page displaying a heading and coming-soon message.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with search, category filtering, and a featured article section.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a full blog article with sharing, metadata, and related posts.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including shipping form, order submission, and cart clearing.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation, honeypot spam check, and contact info display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero banner, featured products, brand info, and previews of new designs.
frontend/src/pages/NewDesignsPage.tsx: Shows newest and limited‑edition products with loading states and sectioned product grids.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and button linking back home.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation with order ID, thank‑you message, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, wishlist/cart actions, image, description, and related products.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Provides product filtering by category, price, gold type, stone type, and sorting, displaying filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user wishlist items or prompts sign‑in, with product grid and loading states.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and subtotal logic persisted to session storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Project-level metadata describing AMOR’s goals, architecture, features, and known issues.
